text: @realDonaldTrump George Bush hesitated for 7 minutes on 9/11. It was his 1st year in office & he was with children. YOU did nothing for 7 weeks when you were informed about Covid19. It was your 4th year in office & you were with experts. YOU chose to ignore the threat. That’s unforgivable.
